advancedUpgrades: Empress-shroom & Enchantress-shroom: Summon Interval → 10 Seconds | Enchantress-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
Empress-shroom & Enchantress-shroom: Can now summon Ultimate Zombies
Gatling Doom & Frenzy-shroom: No more rest between every attack | Gatling Frenzy-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
Gatling Doom & Frenzy-shroom: Bullets fired before firing Doom-shroom bullets decreased from 16 to 4
Twin Solar-nut: Click Cost → 200
Twin Solar-nut: Toughness reduces by 10 for each hit instead of 50
Obsidian Spikerock & Spike-nut: Damage multiplied by 5 | Obsidian Spike-nut Subspecies Unlocked
Obsidian Spikerock & Spike-nut: Gains 95% DMG Reduction
Each Sun now gives 1.5 its value | 15 → 25 → 50 → 75
Glove's cooldown is halved, and can now move Ultimate Zombies
Plants' Damage is increased by 20%
Zombies receive 20% more damage
Each time a Zombie is damaged, the next instance of damage to it is increased by 5%
You now have the option to re-pick your Plant Loadout during the game
Modifier reroll times + 2
Phoenix Threepeater: Enflamed damage bonus 50% → 150%, and regular ignited projectiles can now inflict the debuff
Glove's cooldown -10s, and can now move Ultimate Zombies
Gatling Icicle-shroom & Sunburst-shroom: Icicles now pierce infinitely and split into two diagonal icicles upon impact the first five times
Gatling Icicle-shroom: Gatling Icicle-shroom: Damage to Frozen/Chill-immune zombies 4× → 12× | Gatling Sunburst-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
All Meteors' attack cooldowns are halved | Base DMG increased by 300 for every Magnetar in the field
Adds 4 Lumos Levels for the entire field
Radiant Pot: Upgrade costs from Silver Pots to Golden Pots will not exceed 8k
Radiant Pot: Coins exceeding the maximum amount will be converted into Sun at a rate of 2:1
Midas Umbrella: Activates ultimate automatically if zombies are near | Aegis Umbrella Subspecies Unlocked
Midas Umbrella: Damage Amplification → 300%
Gain 3000 Sun, then double your total amount of Sun after | Maximum Sun → 100,000
Mallet's cooldown is reduced to 6 seconds
All Plants' recharge is halved
Zombies take an additional 1800 damage when they take more than 1800 damage (after damage reduction)
Clicking on the same plant when you have it on your Gloves will disassemble it | 20 seconds cooldown
Hypnotized zombies gain a 500% damage buff and 80% damage reduction (WARNING: Also causes Cherry Newspaper Zombies from Empress/Enchantress-shroom to not lose their newspaper on summon!!)
Phoenix Threepeater: Bullets can now pierce infinitely and cause Enflamed explosions upon impact | Phoenix Drone Subspecies Unlocked
Imitater's Recharge → 50 Seconds
When two identical plants are placed one above the other (adjacent in the same column), they gain a 50% damage bonus and a 50% damage reduction
Aristocattail: Summoned drones deal 3x more DMG
Aristocattail: Basic homing attacks deal 5x more DMG
True Cherry Bomb: Cherry Bomb bullets will now deal at least 1800 damage every time and cause Cremator damage
True Doom-shroom: Doom-shroom bullets will now release a Doom-shroom explosion upon impact, which leaves no crater
Calamity-shroom: ALL Doom-shroom explosions no longer leave a crater | Avarice-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
Calamity-shroom: Now spawns 3 extra Hypnotized Gargantuars and 1 Zomboni when it explodes

When Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut or their subspecies are both present, Cherrizilla's and its subspecies' attack deals AoE damage and no longer has a max Toughness cap, and Obsidian Tall-Nut and its subspecies gains a 90% DMG Reduction
Tycoonwood: 1% Damage increase to Coin projectiles for every 1000 Coins you have
Tycoonwood: Projectiles now deal splash damage
After a period of time without being attacked, the next time a zombie is attacked, the damage it takes is greatly increased
Enable Column Planting

If there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Helios Cabbages on the field, the Mini Sun summoned by the Helios Cabbage will never disappear and deal 5× more damage, and will keep summoning Helios Meteors
Pharos Umbrella: Energy Limit x10 | Recovery Speed x20 | Healing Interval → 1 Second
Pharos Umbrella: Normal Attack Multiplier → 300% | Explosion Multiplier → 1000% | Explosion Interval → 2 Seconds
The freeze time of all zombies is increased by 25%, and the slow rate from chill is increased by 10%
Buck-shroom Squad & Buck-strike Squadron: Sniper always headshots with a 1/3 chance to trigger rapid-fire, but attack CD increased to 7.5s; Buck-strike Squadron damage ×3
Buck-shroom Squad & Buck-strike Squadron: Flak cannon knockback ×2 & DMG ×2, Buck-strike Squadron DMG x3 | Buck-strike Squadron Subspecies Unlocked

Gatling Cherrybomber now spreads its shots evenly across three lanes with sine and cosine trajectories, and Infernal Squashwood and its subspecies triggers a full-field Jalapeno effect if it can't plant a Spicy plant.
Tesla Magnet: Attack Range ×2
Tesla Magnet: Absorbs 3 Metal Objects at once, damage to Giga Trident-nut Zombies or Giga Football-nut Zombies ×3
You can upgrade 1 upgradable Epic Modifier
Plants deal twice more damage to Mini-bosses
Plants gain a 5% damage bonus for every Zombie Modifier you have
Unlock Swordsage Starfruit
Plants deal ×2 more damage but receive ×4 more damage
Seed packets no longer need recharge but each use cost 15 times the Sun + 50% current Sun
Lawnmowers: Final damage +200%, Attack speed +300%
Cherrizilla Mastery I: Healing Power +100%
Cherrizilla Mastery II: Attack Damage +50%
Gatling Cherrybomber Mastery I: Cherry and other variants of projectiles' explosion radius +50% and damage +100%
Gatling Cherrybomber Mastery II: Cherry and other variants of projectiles' explosion radius -50%  but damage +300%
Doominator Mastery I: Frozen zombies take +50% more damage
Doominator Mastery II: Hypnotized zombies deal 3x more damage
Infernal Squashwood Mastery I: Jalapeno effect changes from instant to DoT, dealing 1/3 the original damage 10 times within 1 second
Infernal Squashwood Mastery II: Grants projectiles +50% damage before igniting them
Plants in the fifth column get 50% increased maximum Toughness and 50% damage reduction. Each column to the left reduces damage cap by 10% and increases damage reduction by 10%

When there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Selene Cabbages on the field, Selene's summoned Mini Moon will not disappear, while each Magnetar and Selene will charge a beam into the Mini Moon, which redirects it to target the zombie with the most amount of HP
Grim Arbiter: Seed packet drop is now guaranteed
Grim Arbiter: When destroying Odyssey plants with on-death effects, the effect is amplified 4 times
Big Bang Cherry: Radiation Zone duration increased to 10s
Big Bang Cherry: Explosive cherries and bullets of Doom has a 1% chance of transforming into Nuclear Debris when they hit zombies
ultimateUpgrades: Cherrizilla & Garlizilla: HP Recovery x3
Cherrizilla & Garlizilla: Devour CD reduced to 15s
Gatling Cherrybomber: Explosive cherries from plants x3 damage
Gatling Cherrybomber & Cherrybomber Drone: Attack Speed +100%
Doominator: Attack speed x3; Thornminator attack damage x3; Snowclaw Zombie (?) attack damage x3
Doominator: Zombies will take 30% of their current health as damage when unfrozen
Infernal Squashwood & Sparkwood: Bullets required to spawn a Spicy plant → 10
Infernal Squashwood & Sparkwood: Ignites the lane immediately when spawning a Spicy plant is not possible
Magnetar: Attack Interval → 0.5 Seconds
Magnetar: Lv1: Base damage ×2 and damage cap (300) increased to 3000; Lv2: Base damage ×3, damage cap removed
Shroomageddon & Atomheart Plantern: Shroomageddon damage on death → 1M, Atomheart Plantern Lumos addition on death ×3
Shroomageddon & Atomheart Plantern: Now immune to Cherry and Jack-in-the-Box explosions. After resisting 10k points of explosive damage, triggers a Doom-shroom explosion
Wither-pult & Rot-pult: Spread-fire is now a 100% chance
Wither-pult & Rot-pult: Lv1: Stacking Poison points will immediately poison the zombie and Poison Value Cap → 120; Lv2: Poison Value Cap removed
Cob-literator: Main Blast damage ×4
Cob-literator: Reload Time → 12 Seconds
Obsidian Tall-Nut & Obsidian-mine: Max HP Cap ×3
Obsidian Tall-nut & Obsidian-mine: Can now absorb the damage directed to the two plants on its left and right
Charmatron: Hypnotization HP threshold increased from 60% to 100%
Charmatron: Charges will not drop below 2, and maximum charges is increased to 3 | Attack Interval → 1 Second
Apeacalypse Minigun & Railgun: Attack Power ×3 and Knockback Strength ×3
Apeacalypse Minigun & Railgun: Lv1: Defense increases as Toughness decreases. Below 500 HP, it becomes immune to damage under 1k; Lv2: Below 500 HP, base damage ×2

Helios & Selene Cabbage: When Sun exceeds 15k, each of Helios Cabbage's attacks consumes 0.5% of the excess to boost projectile damage by 20 per 1 Sun spent | Selene Cabbage's damage increased by 3x per Lumos Level
Helios & Selene Cabbage: Mini Sun deals 3x more damage | Mini Moon heals 3x more
Laser & Blast Pumpkin: Wingmen Amount → 3
Laser Pumpkin: Wingmen and Drone DMG x3
Napalm-shroom: Charging speed and max charging duration ×3
Napalm-shroom: Inferno lasts twice as long
Kelptain Goldbeard: Plants deal 5% more attack damage for every 1000 points owned (up to +300%)
Kelptain Goldbeard: The Odyssey shop now has a 30% discount on Modifiers
Quantum McCornics: Black hole can absorb all bullets
Quantum McCornics: The attraction range of black holes greatly increased
Boreal Lifereaver: Boreal reaper saws now last for 15 Seconds
Boreal Lifereaver: Healing is no longer split among plants
Tyrannoflora Lux: Attack Range ×2
Tyrannoflora Lux: Provides 2 Lumos Level to a 5×5 area during digestion
Vulcannon: Volcanic Bombs Damage ×3
Vulcannon: Now triggers Thermonuclear Detonations when main blasts strike Cherry Bombs or Jalapenos
Princess Solarnova: When a solar shot hits a zombie, it cause nearby projectiles to explode as well
Princess Solarnova: Energy cap ×3, Sun production amount after storage overflow ×3
Vortex Melon: Nebula Rift now focuses on the zombie with the least HP for the first half of the barrage
Vortex Melon: Cryo-melon damage ×6, but with decreased splash radius
Prometheus Liontail: Heatbeam damage frequency ×2
Prometheus Liontail: Regular shots' damage ×3
Scylla Leviathan: Tangler minions can drown up to 3 zombies (or deal ×3 damage), and each zombie drowned rewards 10 energy stacks
Scylla Leviathan: Fires 3 base attack projectiles at once

Sharkmarine: Gains 50% Damage Reduction
Kirov Zomppelin: Immunity to Blovers | Increased Movement Speed
Kirov Zomppelin: Drones' HP Increased by 50 times

Giga Trident-nut Zombie: Now ignores Umbrella-type plants and targets random plants to attack

Superstar Zombie: Will now phase through plants when charging

All your existing plants have a 1/3 chance to perish (applied once)

Double the health of all zombies
Increase the maximum limit of zombies per wave to 100
